name: Bridgeburner Demolitionist
text: When Bridgeburner Demolitionist enters the battlefield, destroy target land. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Bridgeburner Demolitionist deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: The Bridgeburner Company was once famous for its skill in ambush and destruction; now it's famous for its members' hatred of the very empire they once served.
